arts.ttl: Celtic 'considering' Lennon Miller transfer raid after earlier bid booted out by Motherwell
arts.sum: The Premiership champions could test the Steelmen's resolve again as the window reaches its conclusion

arts.ttl: Elena Sadiku fumes at Celtic cup exit while Rangers and Hearts ease through to next round
arts.sum: The Swede has warned her players they can't allow errors to derail their season with only one prize left to play for

arts.ttl: Jota scores on emotional Celtic return while Rangers rout Ross County
arts.sum: Rodgers’ side stay 10 points clear after win at Motherwell Hagi strikes twice to round off positive week for Rangers The Celtic manager, Brendan Rodgers, backed Jota to be an even bigger success second time round after the Portuguese winger marked his “emotional” return with a goal in a 3-1 win at Motherwell. The 65th-minute substitute appeared to be in tears shortly after converting a pass from Daizen Maeda to round off the Scottish Premiership victory in the closing seconds and celebrating in front of the visiting fans. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers gives Celtic fans the unflinching transfer reality - 'The club knows my feelings and why I came back'
arts.sum: It was warts and all for Rodgers as he opened up on their transfer plan

arts.ttl: Why Jota and Celtic just seem like 'perfect' fit
arts.sum: Jota marked his second Celtic debut with a goal in front of the club's fans and his new manager Brendan Rodgers says it's the "perfect environment" for the winger.

arts.ttl: Jota catching Celtic feels will make him even BETTER as Brendan Rodgers tells him he's a lucky boy
arts.sum: Jota cut an emotional figure after goalscoring second debut and Rodgers reckons he'll now realise how good he has it in the Hoops

arts.ttl: Aiden McGeady and Kris Boyd wowed by Celtic star after win over Motherwell
arts.sum: Celtic beat Motherwell 3-1, with Daizen Maeda opening the scoring inside a minute, Adam Idah adding to his brace from Villa Park and Jota scoring upon his return . Aiden McGeady and Kris Boyd praise Daizen Maeda as Celtic beat Motherwell

arts.ttl: BBC Sportsound forced to apologise for embarrassing Rangers gaffe as Jota made his Celtic debut vs Motherwell
arts.sum: The Portuguese winger looked lively as he almost made an instant impact after he fizzed a left-footed volley past the post and had three shots on goal in Celtic’s win over the Fir Park side . The live commentary feed switched to Rangers’ game against Ross County at the exact minute Jota stepped onto the Fir Park turf in a moment that would have left many thousands of Celtic fans raging and disappointed.

arts.ttl: Celtic transfer dealmaker phones the Hotline, signs a striker for £15million and then asks 'what's the panic Bhoys?'
arts.sum: Fraser Wilson answers your calls and it's all about signing season despite the big two winning on Sunday

arts.ttl: Kyogo endures nightmare Rennes debut as Celtic hero equals unwanted 18 year Ligue 1 record
arts.sum: The Hoops hero has had a tough start to life in France following his move from Glasgow
